name: The Eridanus Monument
description:
A short, narrative experience made for the Game Dev League Area 51 October Game Jam. Features include:

  1. A storyline driven game
  2. A short SETI search style mini game
  3. Procedurally driven sounds and music (download version only*)

Known Limitations

  1. The resolution is fixed at 1024*768 because its a game jam and I don't have time to test in lots of resolutions :)
  2. Procedural audio generation doesn't appear to work in WebGL. I've had to record the music playing on the desktop application and included that in the WebGL version only. This means that some of the audio in the minigames is missing in the WebGL version

You will probably get a slightly better experience in the downloaded version, but the WebGL one works OK.

Source code released under MIT License, see https://bitbucket.org/willhart/gdl_area51_jam
